name: Ghast
description: Ghast Protocol is an enhanced yield-and-lending protocol built on top of GMX's $GLP, GMD Protocol, and other existing large-cap applications within the Arbitrum ecosystem. By employing an enhanced version of GMD Protocol's Pseudo-Delta-Neutral strategy, we are a liquidation-free money-market strategies for yield-bearing tokens, allowing DeFi investors to access institution-grade yield optimization and unlock utmost capital efficiency.
